description:
This is a great private one bedroom apt very spacious, not far from Columbia University. The apt is off Riverside Park and lets in a lot of sunlight, it is very quiet and beautiful. Fairway market is just three blocks away where you can buy great organic produce. The 1 train is t blocks away on broadway at 125th street, making it easy to get anywhere in manhattan in minutes! The living area has Air Conditioning and we have two bikes available for our guests to use as well upon request!

We are next to Columbia University, Manhattan school of Music, Riverside church, Apollo Theater, Central Park, and the Hudson River. The apt is two blocks away to the one train on Broadway, which takes you to Times Square in less than 10 minutes. Fairway Market is a short 5 minute walk on Riverside Drive where you can buy great produce. The bedroom features a California king size bed, A large flat screen TV with ROKU, the guest can access all their accounts through there. The apt is filled with natural sunlight and is fully furnished with a mix of antique and modern decor and art. The kitchen is private and fully stocked for your convenience. Riverside park is right outside the apt where you can walk to the beautiful Hudson River it makes the space very quiet and feel like an oasis from the city. The living room features two couches, one being a pull out queen bed if needed for extra guests. The apt has 24hour laundry room and a dry cleaning right around the corner on Riverside Drive. It is a wonderful apt! very well kept and made with a lots of love, it is a true New York City apt.

The entire apt is open for the guests as well as two large closets and a dresser with lot's of room.

We are available at any time if needed.

Located on Riverside Dr. Close to Riverside Park, Hudson River, Riverside Church, fairway market, Columbia University, Manhattan School of Music, Apollo Theater, Central Park, Whole Foods, Columbus circle, Alvin Ailey, Lincoln Center a 15-20 minute subway ride to Times Square. Fairway market is a great market located just three blocks away. The apt is not far from Columbia University and therefor there are many bars and restaurants right on Broadway which is two blocks away, there is absolutely no noise heard in the apt from outside. It is an extremely quiet building and neighborhood in general, everyone is very respectful of each other. It's an oasis from the loudness of NYC but your also just steps away from that as well!

The one train is two blocks away form the apt at 125th and Broadway and we have two bikes that guests can have access to upon request
name: Large, Fully Furnished, SUNNY Apt@ Riverside Park
review: Had a nice stay. Close to subway. Very nice neighberhoud. Lovely apartment.
